content:
CS 162 - Automata Theory Homework 4, 50 Points
Due: Monday, May 6, 11:55pm

Please submit your written solutions to the first two problems in pdf format via Gradescope.

  1. 10 points. Exercise 2.4, parts b, c, and e in Sipser.
  2. 10 points. Exercise 2.5, parts b, c, and e in Sipser.
  3. 10 points. Exercise 2.14 in Sipser.
  4. 10 points. Exercise 2.30, part a in Sipser.
  5. 10 points. Exercise 2.31 in Sipser.
